message:
Confirm object visual appearance.
Requirements:
- make sure there is only one rigid body.
- make sure the object has a valid texture or appearance.
- make sure the object has all parts necessary.

Confirm reasonable bounding box size:
1.19m, 76.45cm, 2.45m
Make sure these sizes are within the same order of magnitude you expect from this object IRL.
If the scale is off, please let us know by a factor of how much (for example, 1000 if something
that's supposed to be 1mm is 1m instead) in your complaint note.

Check if the object looks like it absolutely MUST be a soft body.
Requirements:
- type 'cloth' if you think the object can reasonably be simulated by 2D cloth.
- type 'soft' if it needs to be soft but still needs to have a volume.
- just hit enter without typing anything if the object does NOT have to be a soft body.
